name: kaspersky-security-center
label: Kaspersky Security Center
description: Kaspersky Security Center makes it easy to manage and secure both physical and virtual endpoints from a single, unified management console.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: URL of the Kaspersky Security Center server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Username to access the Kaspersky Security Center server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: username

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Password to access the Kaspersky Security Center server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: password

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get Host List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all hosts located in specific group from the Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Group ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the group based on which you want to retrieve a list of all host details from Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: group_id

operations.title: Get Host Details
operations.description: Retrieves a host details from the Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Host ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the host based on which you want to retrieve host details from Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: host_id

operations.title: Get Host Group Static Info
operations.description: Retrieves a host group static Info from the Kaspersky Security Center.

operations.title: Get Software Installed on Specific Host
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all product details installed from the Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Host ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the host based on which you want to retrieves a product details from the Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: host_id

operations.title: Get Products Installed
operations.description: Retrieves a kaspersky product details installed at specific host from the Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Host ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the host based on which you want to retrieve product details from Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: host_id

operations.title: Add Group
operations.description: Create a new administration group in Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Group Parent ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the parent group based on which you want to create a new group in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: parent_id

parameters.title: Group Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the group based on which you want to create a new group in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: name

operations.title: Get All Groups Details
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all groups from the Kaspersky Security Center.

operations.title: Move Host to Specific Group
operations.description: Move Host from group to other group in Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: New Group ID
parameters.description: Specify the group ID based on which you want to move host to specific group in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: newgroup

parameters.title: Host Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the host based on which you want to move host to specific group in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: pHostNames

operations.title: Delete Specific Group
operations.description: Deletes an specific administrative group in the Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Group ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the group based on which you want to delete a specific group in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: group_id

parameters.title: Value
parameters.description: Specify the value  based on which you want to delete a specific group in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: flag
parameters.tooltip: 1 = Delete group only if it is empty, 2 = delete group with subgroups, policies and tasks 3 = delete group with subgroups, hosts, policies and tasks.

operations.title: Add Policy
operations.description: Create New Policy and assigned to specific Group in Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Group Id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the group based on which you want to create a new policy in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: nGroupId

parameters.title: Policy Display Name
parameters.description: Specify the display name of the policy based on which you want to create a new policy in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: KLPOL_DN

parameters.title: Policy Product Name
parameters.description: Specify the product name of the policy based on which you want to create a new policy in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: KLPOL_PRODUCT

parameters.title: Policy Product Version
parameters.description: Specify the product version of the policy based on which you want to create a new policy in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: KLPOL_VERSION

parameters.title: Policy GROUP ID
parameters.description: Specify the group ID of the policy based on which you want to create a new policy in Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: KLPOL_GROUP_ID

operations.title: Get All Policies on Specific Group
operations.description: Retrieves a policies located in specified group from the Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Group ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the group based on which you want to retrieves list of all policies from Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: group_id

operations.title: Get Specific Policy
operations.description: Retrieve a specific policy from the Kaspersky Security Center.

parameters.title: Policy ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the policy based on which you want to retrieve a specific policy from Kaspersky Security Center.
parameters.name: policy_id
